In the heart of New York City’s downtown is a one-of-a-kind hotel. Just turn the corner from SOHO’s celebrated shops and cafes, enter the doors where the staff greets you by name, and find yourself on our peaceful, secluded patio for refreshments and a heavenly view to the sky above. This architectural gem offers guests a rare pause in this exciting city. Welcome to The Broome.

We’re proud to be your home away from home. We’ve paid attention to every detail – from the design of the property, the tastefully curated objects and modern amenities, to our personalized service – so that your stay is seamless, comfortable and memorable.
